    What's on in Glasgow - IMAX at GSC Change cinema Show films from all cinemas


    Advance Screenings

    People's choice

    Gravity

    98 people want to see the film.


    Educational Films

    Award-winning documentaries and inspirational films for the entire family, all in stunning IMAX.

    About Cineworld Glasgow - IMAX at GSC

    The Cineworld IMAX at Glasgow Science Centre is the biggest screen in Scotland showing a range of blockbuster movies and educational documentaries


    Experience the following:

    IMAX Screen 3D
    Facilities, location & ticket prices
